title: Major Rivers of India
content:
# Major Rivers of India

## Classification by Origin

### Himalayan Rivers
- Perennial (year-round flow)
- Fed by glaciers and rain
- Long courses

### Peninsular Rivers
- Seasonal (rain-dependent)
- Short courses
- Flow into Bay of Bengal (east) or Arabian Sea (west)

## Major River Systems

### Ganga River System
| Feature | Detail |
|---------|--------|
| Origin | Gangotri Glacier |
| Length | 2,525 km (longest in India) |
| Tributaries | Yamuna, Son, Ghaghara, Gandak, Kosi |
| Flows through | Uttarakhand, UP, Bihar, WB |
| Empties into | Bay of Bengal |
| Delta | Sundarbans (largest delta) |

### Brahmaputra River System
| Feature | Detail |
|---------|--------|
| Origin | Angsi Glacier (Tibet) |
| Length | 2,900 km (total) |
| Names | Tsangpo (Tibet), Dihang (India), Jamuna (Bangladesh) |
| Tributaries | Dibang, Lohit, Subansiri |
| Flows through | Tibet, Arunachal Pradesh, Assam |
| Special | Only male river in India |

### Indus River System
| Feature | Detail |
|---------|--------|
| Origin | Mansarovar Lake (Tibet) |
| Length | 2,880 km |
| Tributaries | Jhelum, Chenab, Ravi, Beas, Sutlej |
| Empties into | Arabian Sea |
| Note | Mostly flows through Pakistan |

## Peninsular Rivers

### East-flowing Rivers
| River | Origin | Length | Empties |
|-------|--------|--------|----------|
| Mahanadi | Chhattisgarh | 851 km | Bay of Bengal |
| Godavari | Nashik | 1,465 km | Bay of Bengal |
| Krishna | Mahabaleshwar | 1,400 km | Bay of Bengal |
| Kaveri | Coorg (Karnataka) | 800 km | Bay of Bengal |

### West-flowing Rivers
| River | Origin | Length | Empties |
|-------|--------|--------|----------|
| Narmada | Amarkantak | 1,312 km | Arabian Sea |
| Tapti | Satpura | 724 km | Arabian Sea |

## Important Facts

- **Longest River**: Ganga (2,525 km in India)
- **Largest River by Volume**: Brahmaputra
- **Sorrow of Bihar**: Kosi River
- **Sorrow of Bengal**: Damodar River
- **Dakshin Ganga**: Godavari
- **Old Ganga**: Godavari
- **Largest Peninsula River**: Godavari

## River Projects (Dams)

| Dam | River | State |
|-----|-------|-------|
| Bhakra Nangal | Sutlej | HP-Punjab |
| Hirakud | Mahanadi | Odisha |
| Nagarjuna Sagar | Krishna | Telangana-AP |
| Sardar Sarovar | Narmada | Gujarat |
| Tehri Dam | Bhagirathi | Uttarakhand |
